oai_dc:dc.dc:title: McReynolds Furniture
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Brown-toned photograph of three unidentified men standing outside of McReynolds Furniture Company, formerly located on Franklin Street in Clarksville. This photograph was taken in approximately 1900. Postcard has a divided back and some damage on the front and edges. Note: this postcard was removed from the W. J. Souza Collection.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Stores & shops; Men
